workflow.title: Compound Library Screen For Reaction Enumeration
workflow.description: This workflow performs a compound library screen for molecules which match the given template reaction. The reaction is loaded from a RXN file and the Reaction_Reactant_Splitter splits the reaction into its reactants. The compound library is loaded iteratively from a SD file. Afterwards a substructure search is performed for each reactant and the results are saved as SD files.
